query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS brain_embeddings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id INT NOT NULL,
  chunk_index INT NOT NULL,
  chunk_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  chunk_tokens INT,
  embedding JSON NOT NULL,
  document_title TEXT,
  document_domain VARCHAR(100),
  document_category VARCHAR(100),
  document_tags TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_doc_chunk (document_id, chunk_index),
  INDEX idx_embeddings_document (document_id),
  INDEX idx_embeddings_domain (document_domain),
  INDEX idx_embeddings_category (document_category)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 7DorTNURquHZQZu.root --database WQoqrgvAJmZqDJX9hYJoWw --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS brain_embeddings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id INT NOT NULL,
  chunk_index INT NOT NULL,
  chunk_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  chunk_tokens INT,
  embedding JSON NOT NULL,
  document_title TEXT,
  document_domain VARCHAR(100),
  document_category VARCHAR(100),
  document_tags TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_doc_chunk (document_id, chunk_index),
  INDEX idx_embeddings_document (document_id),
  INDEX idx_embeddings_domain (document_domain),
  INDEX idx_embeddings_category (document_category)
);
